recipe.title: Beans and Sausages
recipe.ingredient: 1 cans beans rinsed and drained unless using baked beans then use the entire contents
recipe.step: Heat oil in fry pan and cook sausages until brown all over.
Add garlic and cook for a few more minutes.
Add all other ingredients, except the parsley.
Cook for 20 minutes or until heated through and sauce thicken slightly.
Stir through parsley and serve with a few leaves sprinkled on top.
Serve with crusty bread, mash or rice, if desired.
